name: Anthony Russo
biography:
Freelance artist/illustrator living in Rhode Island.
Born in Rhode Island in 1947.
Clients include the New York Times, Washington Post, Boston Globe, New Yorker, Rolling Stone, Esquire, Random House, etc.
Various awards for illustrations from Communication Arts, American Illustration, Society of Illustrators and Graphis Annual.
Has taught at Rhode Island School of Design and Parsons.

Source: Personal communication from Anthony Russo.
